changes:
### Features 
- Added "Mimic Role" in the game settings. Now you decide which role the AI will pretend as.
- Added mobile exclusive card-swiping style UI to the game page. Now you can enjoy Turing Game on your phone! 
### UI Improvements 
- Added markdown syntax to this "Recent Changes" popup.
- Fixed text color in some places default to white on iOS devices.
- Better tooltip on mobile devices.
- Feedback button now isn't blocked by keyboard popup.

### Initial Release
- Core game functionality
- Room creation and joining
- Question generation system
- Voting mechanism
- Results display
- Feedback system
